body_html:
The with_gil option is also gone. changing the following in the cwrap compiles:

[[
  name: data_ptr
  with_gil: afa af af af af
  auto_gpu: False
  return: void*
  cpu_half: True
  cname: data
  arguments:
    - THTensor* self
]]
body_text:
The with_gil option is also gone. changing the following in the cwrap compiles:
[[
  name: data_ptr
  with_gil: afa af af af af
  auto_gpu: False
  return: void*
  cpu_half: True
  cname: data
  arguments:
    - THTensor* self
]]
body:
The `with_gil` option is also gone. changing the following in the cwrap compiles:
```
[[
  name: data_ptr
  with_gil: afa af af af af
  auto_gpu: False
  return: void*
  cpu_half: True
  cname: data
  arguments:
    - THTensor* self
]]
```
